div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1557 Teffaha, c. 20 km. E of Tartus (anc. Antaradus), N. Phoenicia, 1954 Burial: c. 140 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 27+ AR Alexander III: 16+ late post. tetradr. (Temnus 13+, Alabanda 2, Aspendus 1) Myrina: 4 tetradr. Cyme: 5+ tetradr. Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. Demetrius II: 1 tetradr. (yr. 168) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
